subject: My dearest friend
body:
My dearest friend
This is to inform you that my consignment has finally been received
and secured in the hands of a good friend who finally make an effort
just the way you did make an effort for us to receive them but to no
avail maybe because of the financial situation on your end or maybe
covid-19 thing, but thank God all are over now.
Note that a friend has finally received the two trunk boxes and is
well saved now. So right now, I am contacting you to compensate you
for all your past effort.  I have made a provision of $2million USD
for you for your past help to me. So I want you to contact. Capt.
Joseph Tan, with this below email address: 
joeeseptan@gmail.com
   for
your own money, and I am assuring you this, once you contact him, he
will release your money to your account without any more delay. Inform
me once you contact him. Once again, below here is his
joeeseptan@gmail.com
Yours in service,
SGT. Larry Hudson.

subject: Re: My dearest friend
body:
Dear SGT. Larry Hudson,

I'm glad to hear that the situation has been resolved and that you are safe now. I appreciate your kind gesture of compensation for my past efforts.

I will contact Capt. Joseph Tan as per your instructions and will keep you updated on the progress.

Thank you once again for considering me in this matter.

Best wishes,
Betty
